name: Distance (itch) (rahadianrayhan)
description:
Dunia sedang dilanda virus yang bernama covid 19, jadi kita diminta untuk menjaga jarak supaya terhindar dan tidak tertular virus ini. Dengan menjaga jarak kita bisa terus sehat dan tetap memakai masker untuk berjaga-jaga.

The world is being hit by a virus called covid 19, so we are asked to keep our distance so as to avoid and not get this virus. By keeping our distance we can continue to be healthy and keep wearing masks just in case.
